Thugs Of Hindostan Opens To Pathetic Audience Reviews, Fans Compare The Film To Aamir's Mela!
Thugs Of Hindostan Opens To Pathetic Audience Reviews, Fans Compare The Film To Aamir's Mela!
He might be the one holding the tag of a perfectionist in Bollywood but nothing can save him from the disaster that awaits him.
Aamir Khan's multi-starrer and YRF's magnum opus Thugs Of Hindostan has hit the theatres and in less than 24 hours of the release, people are outraging because of the disappointment they are having to face.
Also starring, Amitabh Bachchan, Katrina Kaif and Fatima Sana Shaikh, the film had promised a unique experience. It had released in over 7000 screens worldwide but netizens are already out with the verdict and it's surely not a favorable one.
Comparing it with Mela, netizens have completely dismissed the film. Read on!
In case you are wondering whether to watch the film or not, these tweets will help you out!
